publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1588 Mrs Margaret Ewing: Arthritis and Osteoporosis Resource Centre, Woolmanhill, Aberdeen—That the Parliament commends the work of the Arthritis and Osteoporosis Resource Centre, Woolmanhill, Aberdeen and similar organisations across Scotland; recognises the need to ensure that the work of this centre continues to progress, and urges the Scottish Executive to consider extending its support to all arthritis and osteoporosis sufferers in Scotland.
S1M-1588 Arthritis and Osteoporosis Resource Centre, Woolmanhill, Aberdeen (lodged on 24 January 2001) Mr Alex Salmond*

S1M-1588 Mrs Margaret Ewing: Arthritis and Osteoporosis Resource Centre, Woolmanhill, Aberdeen—That the Parliament commends the work of the Arthritis and Osteoporosis Resource Centre, Woolmanhill, Aberdeen and similar organisations across Scotland; recognises the need to ensure that the work of this centre continues to progress, and urges the Scottish Executive to consider extending its support to all arthritis and osteoporosis sufferers in Scotland. Supported by: Mr Alex Salmond

S1M-1588 Arthritis and Osteoporosis Resource Centre, Woolmanhill, Aberdeen (lodged on 24 January 2001) Fergus Ewing*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Pauline McNeill*, Fiona McLeod*, Shona Robison*

S1M-1588 Arthritis and Osteoporosis Resource Centre, Woolmanhill, Aberdeen (lodged on 24 January 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Irene McGugan*, Michael Matheson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Michael Russell*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-1588 Arthritis and Osteoporosis Resource Centre, Woolmanhill, Aberdeen (lodged on 24 January 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Tricia Marwick*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-1588 Arthritis and Osteoporosis Resource Centre, Woolmanhill, Aberdeen (lodged on 24 January 2001) Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*, Brian Adam*
